ValidationRule.description: Unless the Origin is marked as "PGi Contract", Requestor's Email is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT (ispickval( Origin__c, 'PGi Contract')), NOT (ispickval( Origin__c, 'Email')), isblank( RequestorsEmail__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi_Pricing_Help_Request')
